name: Art Of Harvest (Racing) - Ludum Dare 52
description:
Oh no! It's the day of the harvest and you have woken up late and you live deep down some winding paths! Whatever will you do!?!?! 

Jump in a sooped-up Combine Harvester and race down the rally track to reach the harvest on time.

Art of Harvest is a Art of Rally inspired rally game where you must drive a combine harvester down the rally track to reach the harvest on-time! Avoid Obstacles, Hit Checkpoints and Race to the fastest time on the Online Leaderboards!

CONTROLS:

Accelerate - W / Xbox & PlayStation - Right Trigger

Brake/Reverse - S / Xbox & PlayStation- Left Trigger

Steer - A & D / Xbox & PlayStation - Left Stick

Reset - R / Xbox Y / Playstation Triangle

Controller Support is Untested and probably won't work in Menus.

TIP: Checkpoints are marked with tires on the side of the road, you must hit all checkpoints in the correct order to finish.

TIP: Combine Harvesters are rear-wheel steering meaning that **steering may feel inverted**

TIP: Hitting Obstacles gains you penalties added to your finishing time

If you have any comments please post them on the LD Page :)
